languages.text: "Это Серый Вортен, мой архмилитант. Свирепый воин, и верен мне, словно послушное животное. Я купил его совсем мелким и почти мертвым на одной вшивой колонии, а теперь он практически часть моей династии".

traits.locale_text: "Это Серый Вортен, мой архмилитант. Свирепый воин, и верен мне, словно послушное животное. Я купил его совсем мелким и почти мертвым на одной вшивой колонии, а теперь он практически часть моей династии".

languages.text: "This is Worten the Grey, my Arch-Militant. A fierce warrior, and as loyal to me as an obedient beast to its master. I bought him in a miserable colony back when he was a runt on his last legs, and now he is practically a part of my dynasty."
languages.original_text: "Это Серый Вортен, мой архмилитант. Свирепый воин, и верен мне, словно послушное животное. Я купил его совсем мелким и почти мертвым на одной вшивой колонии, а теперь он практически часть моей династии".

traits.locale_text: "This is Worten the Gray, my Arch-militant. A fierce warrior, and loyal to me like an obedient beast. I bought him in one miserable colony back when he was a runt on his last legs, and now he is practically a part of my dynasty."

"This is Worten the Gray, my Arch-militant. A fierce warrior, and loyal to me like an obedient beast. I bought him in one miserable colony back when he was a runt on his last legs, and now he is practically a part of my dynasty."

"This is Worten the Grey, my Arch-Militant. A fierce warrior, and as loyal to me as an obedient beast to its master. I bought him in a miserable colony back when he was a runt on his last legs, and now he is practically a part of my dynasty."

"This is Worten the Grey, my Arch-Militant. A fierce warrior, and as loyal to me as an obedient beast to its master. I bought him in a miserable colony back when he was a runt on his last legs, and now he is practically a part of my dynasty."

"This is Worten the Grey, my Arch-Militant. A fierce warrior, and as loyal to me as an obedient beast to its master. I bought him in a miserable colony back when he was a runt on his last legs, and now he is practically a part of my dynasty."

languages.text: 「こいつは俺のアーク・ミリタント、ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイだ。どう猛な戦士にして、主人に従う獣のごとく俺に忠誠を誓っている。こいつが壊れかかってたチビのころ、粗末なコロニーから買い戻した。それが今や、俺の王朝における実用的な一部品だ」
languages.original_text: "This is Worten the Grey, my Arch-Militant. A fierce warrior, and as loyal to me as an obedient beast to its master. I bought him in a miserable colony back when he was a runt on his last legs, and now he is practically a part of my dynasty."

traits.locale_text: 「こいつは俺のアーク・ミリタント、ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイだ。どう猛な戦士にして、主人に従う獣のごとく俺に忠誠を誓っている。こいつが壊れかかってたチビのころ、粗末なコロニーから買い戻した。それが今や、俺の王朝における実用的な一部品だ」

languages.text: “这位是灰斑沃尔腾，我的首席战士。沃尔腾勇猛无匹，而且对我唯命是从，就像野兽服从驯兽师的命令一样。我在某个贫穷的殖民地买下他时，他还只是个奄奄一息的小不点儿。现在，他已经是我的王朝的正式成员了。”
languages.original_text: "This is Worten the Grey, my Arch-Militant. A fierce warrior, and as loyal to me as an obedient beast to its master. I bought him in a miserable colony back when he was a runt on his last legs, and now he is practically a part of my dynasty."

traits.locale_text: “这位是灰斑沃尔腾，我的首席战士。沃尔腾勇猛无匹，而且对我唯命是从，就像野兽服从驯兽师的命令一样。我在某个贫穷的殖民地买下他时，他还只是个奄奄一息的小不点儿。现在，他已经是我的王朝的正式成员了。”

languages.text: «Este es Worten el Gris, mi Archimilitante. Un guerrero feroz que me es tan fiel como una bestia obediente lo es hacia su amo. Lo compré en una colonia miserable cuando estaba en las últimas, y ahora es prácticamente parte de mi dinastía».
languages.original_text: "This is Worten the Grey, my Arch-Militant. A fierce warrior, and as loyal to me as an obedient beast to its master. I bought him in a miserable colony back when he was a runt on his last legs, and now he is practically a part of my dynasty."

traits.locale_text: «Este es Worten el Gris, mi Archimilitante. Un guerrero feroz que me es tan fiel como una bestia obediente lo es hacia su amo. Lo compré en una colonia miserable cuando estaba en las últimas, y ahora es prácticamente parte de mi dinastía».

languages.text: « Il s'agit de Worten le Gris, mon archimilitant. Un farouche guerrier, aussi loyal et obéissant qu'une bête envers son maître. Je l'ai acheté dans une colonie miséreuse quand il n'était encore qu'un avorton et aujourd'hui, il pourrait tout aussi bien faire partie de ma dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "This is Worten the Grey, my Arch-Militant. A fierce warrior, and as loyal to me as an obedient beast to its master. I bought him in a miserable colony back when he was a runt on his last legs, and now he is practically a part of my dynasty."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit de Worten le Gris, mon archimilitant. Un farouche guerrier, aussi loyal et obéissant qu'une bête envers son maître. Je l'ai acheté dans une colonie miséreuse quand il n'était encore qu'un avorton et aujourd'hui, il pourrait tout aussi bien faire partie de ma dynastie. »

languages.text: "Das ist Worten der Graue, mein Erzmilitant. Ein wilder Krieger und mir treu ergeben wie eine gehorsame Bestie ihrem Herrn. Ich habe ihn in einer ärmlichen Kolonie gekauft, als er noch klein und fast am Ende war, und jetzt ist er praktisch ein Teil meiner Dynastie."
languages.original_text: "This is Worten the Grey, my Arch-Militant. A fierce warrior, and as loyal to me as an obedient beast to its master. I bought him in a miserable colony back when he was a runt on his last legs, and now he is practically a part of my dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist Worten der Graue, mein Erzmilitant. Ein wilder Krieger und mir treu ergeben wie eine gehorsame Bestie ihrem Herrn. Ich habe ihn in einer ärmlichen Kolonie gekauft, als er noch klein und fast am Ende war, und jetzt ist er praktisch ein Teil meiner Dynastie."

languages.text: "Gri Worten, Başmilitanım olur. Vahşi bir savaşçı olup bana, efendisine itaatkâr bir yaratık kadar sadıktır. Onu sefil bir kolonide, ölümün pençesindeki bir bücürken satın aldım. Şimdiyse hanedanlığımın bir mensubu sayılır."
languages.original_text: "This is Worten the Grey, my Arch-Militant. A fierce warrior, and as loyal to me as an obedient beast to its master. I bought him in a miserable colony back when he was a runt on his last legs, and now he is practically a part of my dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Gri Worten, Başmilitan'ım olur. Vahşi bir savaşçı ve efendisine itaatkâr bir yaratık kadar sadık bana. Onu sefil bir kolonide, ölmek üzere bir bücürken satın aldım. Şimdiyse neredeyse hanedanlığımın bir parçası oldu."
